about_the_game:
This MEGA equipment pack contains all 316 items from the Bass Pro Shops edition of Fishing Sim World.
The pack is full of some of the best products that Bass Pro Shops produce, as well as boats from Tracker and Nitro and engines from Mercury.
Highlights include;
• Tracker Pro Team 175 TF
• Nitro Z19 and Z21
• Mercury 75, 200, 250 HP engines
• 20 Johnny Morris rods
• 6 Johnny Morris reels
• 142 different lures
• 133 soft baits
• 9 different lines
detailed_description:
This MEGA equipment pack contains all 316 items from the Bass Pro Shops edition of Fishing Sim World.
The pack is full of some of the best products that Bass Pro Shops produce, as well as boats from Tracker and Nitro and engines from Mercury.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: This MEGA equipment pack contains all 316 items from the Bass Pro Shops edition of Fishing Sim World. It contains the best products that Bass Pro Shops produce, as well as boats from Tracker and Nitro and engines from Mercury.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
